com.salesforce.androidsdk.rest

Class ClientManager.AccMgrAuthTokenProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.salesforce.androidsdk.rest.ClientManager.AccMgrAuthTokenProvider
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RestClient.AuthTokenProvider
    Enclosing class:
    ClientManager

    public static class ClientManager.AccMgrAuthTokenProvider
extends java.lang.Object
implements RestClient.AuthTokenProvider
    AuthTokenProvider implementation that calls out to the AccountManager to get a new access token. The AccountManager calls AuthenticatorService to do the actual refresh.
    See Also:
    AuthenticatorService

    • Method Detail

      • getNewAuthToken

        public java.lang.String getNewAuthToken()
        Fetch a new access token from the account manager. If another thread is already in the process of doing this, we'll just wait for it to finish and use that access token.
        Specified by:
        getNewAuthToken in interface RestClient.AuthTokenProvider
        Returns:
        The auth token, or null if we can't get a new access token for any reason.
